extendedInfo.description: The Carbonite Mobile backup and security app for Android makes it easy to automatically back up your Android phone or tabletâs photos and videos to the cloud and access them anytime, anywhere. Carbonite Mobile also protects your Android device in the event it is ever lost or stolen through remote lock and destroy features. Help us improve the app! ---> mobilefeedback@carbonite.comWith the Carbonite Mobile Android backup and security app you can:â¢ Back up â Automatically back up all of your smartphone's full resolution photos and videos.â¢ Access - Browse, view & share your backed up data by logging into www.carbonite.com. Current Carbonite customers can also access their backed up computer files directly through this app.â¢ Locate â Identify the location of your Android device on a map.â¢ Ring â Misplaced your phone? Sound the ringer even if your phone is muted or set to vibrate.â¢ Lock â Lock the screen on your device using a personalized pin.â¢ Capture â Think your device was stolen? Remotely activate the camera to take a photo of the person using your phone.â¢ Destroy âRemotely destroy all of your personal data and reset the device to its factory settings.Tip: Download the app on all your mobile devices to access all of your backed up photos and videos anytime, anywhere. For example, you could access photos and videos on your smartphone from your Android tablet or iPadÂ® if you have the app installed on both devices.Please note: Backup and protection features are currently unavailable to Carbonite Small Business and iOS customers.Terms of Service: http://www.carbonite.com/terms

reviews.title: Only backs up half of photos
reviews.comment: Only backs up half of photos (1200 total) ,  then says \"failed,  retrying in 1min\"... Tried to restart phone,  reinstall program,  clear cache nothing helped.  Think there is a limit on the backup GB amount? I have SGS4. Same problem with SgS3.
reviews.author: Aleksei Kriatchko

reviews.title: Awesome app!!
reviews.comment: I love how you can back up your computer and then look at anything from it on your phone and send it to someone else if you need to. Works flawlessly!!
reviews.author: Mitchell McRae

reviews.title: Good but missing key features
reviews.comment: I want many but not all of my folders backed up. This is a great free extension of my subscription, but I don\'t need every mp4 on my phone backed up. More controls would make this a killer app.
reviews.author: Jon Burg

reviews.title: Works fine.
reviews.comment: Backs up my Mac at work, then I can access my files on my tablet or my PC at home. What\'s not to like?
reviews.author: Kenneth P. Weinkauf

reviews.title: Peace of mind...
reviews.comment: Best software I have ever purchased. No price can be put on the peace of mind knowing your pics are safe and accessible from any device...
reviews.author: Mike Reibenstein

reviews.title: Good reliable friend.
reviews.comment: Great way to protect my data. Effortless. I can rely on the results and have.
reviews.author: Michael Patino

reviews.title: Don\'t be fooled!
reviews.comment: I had been using Carbonite for nearly 3 years. Despite being underwhelmed with the throttled (slow) backup speed, overall, I was satisfied with how it was working. Ultimately, you purchase a service like this in the hopes that you never really have to use it. By that, I mean, you hope you never lose your files or have a need to restore them. Well, that dreaded day came for me where my hard drive crashed & I lost all of my files. At that point, I was very glad that I had all (200 + gigabytes) of my files backed up to Carbonite. Unfortunately, this is where it all went wrong.    Not only did the restore take way too long, the desktop application also had many problems. For starters, I could only restore 2 \342\200\223 3 gigabytes a day. I was told by Carbonite that some of their customers are able to restore up to 18 gigabytes a day. I can tell you first hand, don\342\200\231t believe that! I can also tell you that the slow download speeds had nothing to do with my internet bandwidth. I have a DSL fiber-optic ISP with a constant 40 + Mbps connection; so, the bandwidth is there. It was so bad, I resorted to manually downloading my files directly from their website.
reviews.author: David Colvin

reviews.title: Good potential but needs work
reviews.comment: The app has the potential to be awesome but I can\'t use it because I changed the login email address on my Carbonite account and the app doesn\'t let me change it.  So now I am stuck with an apo I can\'t use and that my phone won\'t let me uninstall.  I hope the developer fixes the login.issue soon.!
reviews.author: Jessica Fox

reviews.title: No option for \"delete/remove\" files
reviews.comment: I will chage my rate to 5 stars when they fix this issue.
reviews.author: GUSTAVO MENJIVAR

reviews.title: Mobile Carbonite
reviews.comment: I have Carbonite on my windows computer, I downloaded the mobile app to my phone. I am short of internal space and tried to uninstall this app because I have Lockout on the phone already. It will not uninstall. Maybe that would be a good feature to have?
reviews.author: Gwen Atwood

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I am so glad to have this app. Not only does it back up my photos from my phone to my paid account,  but anywhere I go I can access my desktop files from the back up. Went on a biz trip and sent out an invoice email before leaving for the airport (only nothing was attached).  Not a problem! From the airport, I accessed my backup through the app, found the file and emailed it before hopping on the plane. Thank you!
reviews.author: Rachel C

reviews.title: Located my lost phone!
reviews.comment: I had no idea this app offered security and lost phone protection. This is amazing. Someone steals your phone you can surreptitiously take a picture of them and bust them.  I love this app
reviews.author: Doctor Steve

reviews.title: Who needs cloud computing when you have Carbonite
reviews.comment: So far working perfectly. Quick access to all my files!!! Read the issues others have with the app. So far has not experienced any. If there is a problem, try their live customers support. They are very helpful and available.
reviews.author: Martin Gregor

reviews.title: Much better.
reviews.comment: After a few quite horrible updates, this app finally is worth having.  The integration with the computer backup & extra phone security features all work very well.  Bringing back from 1 to 4 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth the problems...
reviews.comment: This program shows you can do other things like locate phone, wipe it clean, but you have to log into the system to use it and to do that you have to have paid acct. Thanks according to the chat I just had.
reviews.author: Mac McFarland

reviews.title: Much better than Mozy
reviews.comment: Love the fact that the mobile backup is an added service with the paid subscription for the laptop backup service. Love that there is no data limit to the plan.
reviews.author: Hector Cruz

reviews.title: Works great..
reviews.comment: Perfect companion app for accessing your carbonite backup files. For those who said cant uninstall, go to Settings from your home screen, Device Administrator, and disable Carbonite Mobile from the list..then you can uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: Carbonite help me fix this thank you
reviews.author: james bailey
